task_description: Create Bevy Physics Prototype - a standalone native physics application to validate Rapier3D integration with voxel colliders, character controllers, and optimized collision detection before integrating into the web application.
completed_work: Phase 1: Project Setup (5/5 complete) - crate structure, dependencies, config
Phase 2: Enhanced Physics Collider System (7/7 complete) - bevy feature, native module, spatial filtering
Phase 3: Application Scaffold (7/7 complete) - Bevy app, plugins, camera, debug overlay
Phase 4: World Generation (3/5 partial) - WorldCube mesh generation, pending collider integration
Phase 11: Documentation (4/6 partial) - README, config docs, algorithm docs
pending_work: Phase 4.4-4.5: World collision with VoxelColliderBuilder, dev environment verification
Phase 5: Voxel Object System (6 tasks) - .vox loading, mesh conversion
Phase 6: Dynamic Cube Spawning (6 tasks) - spawn system, physics bodies
Phase 7: Optimized Collision Integration (7 tasks) - AABB overlap, spatial filtering
Phase 8: Player Character System (8 tasks) - PlayerCube, character controller, camera follow
Phase 9: Physics Simulation (8 tasks) - gravity, collisions, parameter tuning
Phase 10: Testing and Validation (8 tasks) - performance benchmarks, edge cases
